How many people are affected by mucopolysaccharidosis type I ?,"Severe MPS I occurs in approximately 1 in 100,000 newborns. Attenuated MPS I is less common and occurs in about 1 in 500,000 newborns.",GHR,mucopolysaccharidosis type I
